newsitem.title: FINLAND: Kesko Nov sales rise 49.7 percent yr/yr.
newsitem.headline: Kesko Nov sales rise 49.7 percent yr/yr.

text.p: Wholesaler Kesko Oy said in a statement on Friday its sales excluding value-added tax (VAT) increased 49.7 percent year-on-year in November to 3.49 billion markka.
However, Kesko's domestic sales excluding Tuko and Kaukomarkkinat acquired earlier this year fell 8.7 percent year-on-year to 2.01 billion markka in November, it said.
In January-November, Kesko's sales rose 34.3 percent year-on-year to 33.41 billion markka, and its domestic sales without Tuko and Kaukomarkkinat rose 0.6 percent to 23.42 billion markka.
